privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: NetPulse ("we", "us", or "our") values your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information. By using our service, you agree to the practices described in this policy.
privacy.section1Content:
We may collect the following types of information:

**Usage Data**: When you use our service, we automatically collect certain information such as your device type, browser type, IP address, access time, and how you interact with the service.

**Query Data**: When you use our analysis feature, the queries you enter are sent to our servers for processing. We do not store these queries in association with your personal identity.

**Cookies and Similar Technologies**: We use cookies and similar technologies to store your preferences, such as language settings, to improve your user experience.
privacy.section2Content:
The information we collect is used for the following purposes:

- To provide, maintain, and improve our service.
- To respond to your queries and provide analysis results.
- To analyze service usage so we can improve the user experience.
- To detect, prevent, and address technical or security issues.
privacy.section3Content:
We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information in the following circumstances:

- **Service Providers**: We may share information with third-party service providers who help us operate our service (e.g., Tavily API for search enhancement and Google Gemini API for analysis).
- **Legal Requirements**: We may disclose your information if required by law or to protect our rights.
privacy.section4Content: We implement reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, loss, or misuse. However, please note that no method of internet transmission or electronic storage is 100% secure.
privacy.section5Content: Depending on applicable law, you may have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. If you wish to exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided below.
privacy.section6Content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. If there are any significant changes, we will post the updated policy on this page and update the "Last Updated" date.
privacy.section7Content:
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

Email: privacy@zxvmax.site
